attributes.action: advise the knighting of the surviving veterans of the great war
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sir,

I petition for the knighting of the surviving veterans of the Great War. I can not add to what they did by mere words, their deeds are sufficient.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
